full_summary:
# Temporary Help Services - Information Technology Support

## Background

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking Temporary Help Services to support its Information Technology (IT) functions. This requirement is open to suppliers who have been pre-qualified under existing Supply Arrangement EN578-172870 and have a category of Computer and Application Support.

## Request for Proposal

The DND has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) to selected suppliers to provide IT support services. The scope of the requirement includes:

### Level of Security Requirement

The resources required to fulfill this requirement must have a minimum security level of Secret.

### Description of the Requirement

The DND requires IT support services to support its operations. Suppliers must demonstrate their ability to provide the required services using resources with a minimum security level of Secret.

### Eligible Suppliers

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* ACOSYS Consulting Services Inc./Services Conseils Acosys Inc.
* The Halifax Computer Consulting Group Inc./ Groupe de consultant en informatique Halifax inc. (joint venture)
* Adirondack Information Management Inc./Group AIM inc. (joint venture)
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* Cofomo Ottawa
* Conoscenti Technologies Inc.
* Dalian Enterprises and Coradix Technology Consulting (joint venture)
* DLS Technology Corporation
* Donna Cona Inc.
* Eagle Professional Resources Inc.
* MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
* NATTIQ INC.
* OLAV Consulting Corp. and MOSHWA Aboriginal Information Technology Corporation (joint venture)
* S.I. Systems ULC
* Spearhead Management Canada Ltd.
* Turtle Island Staffing Inc.

## Proposal Submission Instructions

Suppliers invited to submit a proposal must comply with the instructions outlined in the Request for Proposal document and submit their proposal electronically through the Canada Cost and Services Source (CPSS) portal.

## Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact:

* CFSG (O-G) Temp Help
* Phone: (613) 971-7955
* Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSF@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSF@forces.gc.ca)

## Notice of Expiration

This requirement has expired and no longer accepts proposals.
